The Chronic Kidney Disease (CKD) Surveillance System is overseen by the CDC
to track kidney diseases in the US. The Surveillance System offers numerous 
resources, including:

* **[CKD Risk Calculators](https://nccd.cdc.gov/CKD/Calculators.aspx)** Interactive
tool to estimate individual risk for CKD based on multiple factors.

* **[Prevalence and Incidence Data](https://nccd.cdc.gov/CKD/detail.aspx?Qnum=Q8#refreshPosition)** Aggregate
data on prevalence and incidence by CKD Stage.
